name: Garmin Cadence Sensor 2
categories: Mounts and sensors for bike computers
Wiring, sensors and parts for bike computers
description: Transmitting over both Bluetooth and ANT+, this compact sensor measures your pedal strokes per minute. It fastens to any crank arm and has no magnets or other exposed parts to line up, so it’s a cinch to install, maintain and switch between bikes.Bluetooth™ and ANT+™ secure digital transmission technology.Includes 3 different sized retaining straps to fit all sizes of cranks.Takes one CR2032 battery.Battery life is approximately 360 hours.Range is 10m.Waterproof to 10 meters (does not function underwater).Self calibrates with any compatible Garmin device.
